title: Stanley Kubrick: inside the mind of a visionary filmmaker
brief_description:
“Stanley Kubrick: inside the mind of a visionary filmmaker” was an ACMI Screen Gallery Exhibition; 25 November 2005 - 29 January 2006. See Exhibition activity record “Stanley Kubrick : Inside the mind of a visionary filmmaker” for more information

A landmark international exhibition featuring over 1000 objects from Kubrick’s archives, including props, costumes and models from 2001: A Space Odyssey, A Clockwork Orange and The Shining.
